title: Governance Inter-Agent Commitment Manifest
description: Defines the mandatory structure for the final ledger entry capturing pipeline execution results and agent attestations for Sovereign AGI V94.1 state transition.

transition_id.description: Unique hash identifying the state transition instance.

input_hash_s1.description: Hash of the certified input state artifact (Psi_N). Stage S1.

final_state_hash_s11.description: Hash of the committed next state artifact (Psi_N+1). Stage S11.

cryptographic_standards.description: Specifies the algorithms used for hashing and signing, crucial for auditability.

signature_algorithm.description: Algorithm used for agent attestations (e.g., Ed25519, ECDSA).

p_01_result.description: Results of the P-01 Decision Axiom (S8) based on CFTM assessment.

pass.description: True if the P-01 Decision Axiom passed (Utility > Cost + Epsilon).

finality_timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when P-01 finality was confirmed.

cftm_epsilon.description: The mandatory threshold epsilon enforced by CFTM.

metric_results.description: Certified quantitative assessments leading to P-01 decision.

veto_status.description: Boolean results of mandatory Veto Gates and Context validation.

s03_policy.description: Result of Policy Compliance Veto (S3). True = NOT vetoed.

s04_stability.description: Result of Stability Analysis Veto (S4). True = NOT vetoed.

s06_5_behavioral.description: Result of Behavioral Divergence Veto (S6.5). True = NOT vetoed.

s_context_pass.description: Result of Context Attestation Check (S4.5). True = PASS.

sgs_s9_signature.description: SGS (System Governance Subsystem) signature confirming NRALS logging (S9) and CISM finalization.

gax_s8_signature.description: GAX (Governance Axiom Executor) signature certifying P-01 finality (S8).

crot_s10_signature.description: CRoT (Commitment Root of Trust) signature over the entire GICM manifest (S10).

delta.description: Delta must be >= 0 if P-01 passes, enforcing P-01 axiom logic.
